1.chore:
Advance to Trafalgar Square.
 If you pass Go, collect £200

3.chore:
Advance to Pall Mall.
If you pass Go, collect £200

4.chore:
Advance to the nearest Station. 
 If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.
If owned, pay wonder twice the rental to which they are otherwise entitled

5.chore:
Advance token to nearest Company.
 If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.
 If owned, throw dice and pay owner a total ten times amount thrown.

9.chore:
Go to Jail. Go directly to Jail,
do not pass Go, do not collect £200

10.chore:
Make general repairs on all your property.
For each house pay £25.
For each hotel pay £100

12.chore:
Take a trip to Kings Cross Station.
If you pass Go, collect £200

13.chore:
You have been elected Chairman of the Board.
Pay each player £50

15.chore:
Advance to the nearest Station. 
If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.
If owned, pay wonder twice the rental to which they are otherwise entitled
